item.title: Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver“We’re prepared to seek a court-ordered solution to these problems,” Weiser...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver“We’re prepared to seek a court-ordered solution to these problems,” Weiser said.

sentinelcolorado.com

Colorado AG excoriates Aurora police and firefighters for systematically abusing residents and minorities - Sentinel Colorado

“We’re prepared to seek a court-ordered solution to these problems,” Weiser said.“We’re prepared to seek a court-ordered solution to these problems,” Weiser said.
item.author: Party for Socialism and Liberation

item.title: BREAKING: State investigation finds racism and excessive force...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

BREAKING: State investigation finds racism and excessive force rampant within Aurora Police Department

AG Phil Weiser began his press conference saying, "Last summer we heard loudly and clearly, the people of Colorado expect more from law enforcement."

The exposure and accountability now facing APD and others involved in brutalizing and abusing the people of Aurora is unparalleled in Aurora's history. It was the people who forced this change by coming together by the thousan...ds, month after month, demanding it.

The people have the power to change our society. This is only the beginning!

item.title: Party for Socialism and Liberation - DenverThe 12 remaining charges against Joel Northam, Lillian House and Terrence Roberts were dropped...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - DenverThe 12 remaining charges against Joel Northam, Lillian House and Terrence Roberts were dropped close to a year after their arrest. The decision comes weeks after the indictment of three police officers and two paramedics for the murder of Elijah McClain

peoplesdispatch.org

All charges dropped against activists who fought for justice for Elijah McClain : Peoples Dispatch

The 12 remaining charges against Joel Northam, Lillian House and Terrence Roberts were dropped close to a year after their arrest. The decision comes weeks after the indictment of three police officers and two paramedics for the murder of Elijah McClainThe 12 remaining charges against Joel Northam, Lillian House and Terrence Roberts were dropped close to a year after their arrest. The decision comes weeks after the indictment of three police officers and two paramedics for the murder of Elijah McClain
item.author: Party for Socialism and Liberation

item.title: “It reaffirms the principle of when you fight, you don’t...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

“It reaffirms the principle of when you fight, you don’t know whether or not you’re gonna win or lose the fight, but you know if you don’t fight, you’ve already sealed the deal that you lost,” said Northam.

A trio of Aurora protester leaders, who once faced decades in prison on felony charges stemming from demonstrations last summer over the death of Elijah McClain, had a dozen remaining counts dismis…

denverpost.com

Remaining charges dropped against Aurora protest leaders

A trio of Aurora protester leaders, who once faced decades in prison on felony charges stemming from demonstrations last summer over the death of Elijah McClain, had a dozen remaining counts dismis…A trio of Aurora protester leaders, who once faced decades in prison on felony charges stemming from demonstrations last summer over the death of Elijah McClain, had a dozen remaining counts dismis…
item.author: Party for Socialism and Liberation

item.title: "As the cry for accountability in McClain's death...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

"As the cry for accountability in McClain's death increased, so did demands that the charges against the protesters be dropped. Leaders from across the country joined in the National Committee for Justice in Denver, warning that continued prosecution of the activists for leading peaceful demonstrations against those in power would strike a blow to First Amendment protections everywhere in the country.

"We made it clear from the beginning that we were not going to take a plea deal," Lucero says in a recording made on Breakthrough News earlier today. And as the defendants went through dozens of court dates, slowly the charges were dropped."

They'd been arrested on September 17.

westword.com

Last Charges Dropped Against Elijah McClain Protest Leaders

They'd been arrested on September 17.They'd been arrested on September 17.
item.author: Party for Socialism and Liberation

item.title: Denver activists cleared of all charges! Watch the exclusive...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

Denver activists cleared of all charges! Watch the exclusive BreakThrough News interview with targeted organizers Joel Northam, Eliza Lucero, and Lillian House

In a remarkable turn of events, all charges have been dropped against Denver anti-racist activists Lillian House, Joel Northam, Eliza Lucero and Terrance Rob...

youtube.com

EXCLUSIVE: All Charges Dropped Against Denver Anti-Racist Activists #JusticeForElijahMcClain

In a remarkable turn of events, all charges have been dropped against Denver anti-racist activists Lillian House, Joel Northam, Eliza Lucero and Terrance Rob...In a remarkable turn of events, all charges have been dropped against Denver anti-racist activists Lillian House, Joel Northam, Eliza Lucero and Terrance Rob...
item.author: Party for Socialism and Liberation

item.title: BREAKING: ALL remaining charges against the leaders of the...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

BREAKING: ALL remaining charges against the leaders of the protests for Elijah McClain have been dropped! Tune into BreakThrough News NOW for an exclusive live interview with targeted organizers Joel Northam, Lillian House, and Eliza Lucero: https://youtu.be/V6-Jm5epvIk

That not a single charge of the original 69 stands today represents a tremendous victory. The resources that went into this campaign are colossal: The Aurora Police Department concocted affidavits over 30 page...s long against the activists; they used informants and fabricated evidence against them; they surveilled them; they secured warrants to break into their phones and social media accounts. Today’s complete victory shows that even when facing powerful forces of repression, the unified struggle of the people can win.

Thank you to everyone who has supported the defense of these organizers. The amazing response from across the country and around the world has been decisive in getting us to this point today.

Please read the full statement of the National Committee for Justice in Denver at https://www.denverdefense.off/all_charges_dropped

item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - DenverBreakThrough News

These are the three officers who murdered Elijah McClain. Hundreds of thousands of people took the streets in Denver and around the world demanding justice for ...Elijah.

This indictment is the fruit of people's struggle.

#justiceforelijahmcclain #elijahmcclain #blacklivesmatter #policebrutality #stoppolicebrutality #blacklivesmatter✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿 #policeviolence

Police, medics charged for 2019 death of Elijah McClain

item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - DenverA grand jury has issued charges in the 2019 death of Mr. McClain, a young Black man who was put in a chokehold while walking home from a convenience store.

nytimes.com

Three Officers and Two Paramedics Are Charged in Elijah McClain’s Death

A grand jury has issued charges in the 2019 death of Mr. McClain, a young Black man who was put in a chokehold while walking home from a convenience store.A grand jury has issued charges in the 2019 death of Mr. McClain, a young Black man who was put in a chokehold while walking home from a convenience store.

item.title: Party for Socialism and Liberation - DenverA Colorado grand jury indicted three police officers and two paramedics involved in the August...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - DenverA Colorado grand jury indicted three police officers and two paramedics involved in the August 2019 death of Elijah McClain, a 23-year-old Black man who was stopped by police while walking home from a store, placed in a carotid hold and then injected with ketamine, Colorado Attorney General Phil Wei...

cnn.com

Grand jury indicts police officers and paramedics in 2019 death of Elijah McClain

A Colorado grand jury indicted three police officers and two paramedics involved in the August 2019 death of Elijah McClain, a 23-year-old Black man who was stopped by police while walking home from a store, placed in a carotid hold and then injected with ketamine, Colorado Attorney General Phil Wei...A Colorado grand jury indicted three police officers and two paramedics involved in the August 2019 death of Elijah McClain, a 23-year-old Black man who was stopped by police while walking home from a store, placed in a carotid hold and then injected with ketamine, Colorado Attorney General Phil Wei...

32-COUNT INDICTMENT ANNOUNCED AGAINST THE COPS AND PARAMEDICS WHO MURDERED ELIJAH MCCLAIN ✊ It’s not over yet but Elijah’s killers will stand trial! No impunity for Aurora Police! Justice for Elijah McClain!!

#JusticeforElijahMcClain

A grand jury has indicted the Aurora police officers who were involved in Elijah McClain's death two years ago.

item.title: 🚨🚨 The Supreme Court just struck down the federal eviction...
item.content:encoded:
Party for Socialism and Liberation - Denver

🚨🚨 The Supreme Court just struck down the federal eviction moratorium, putting 11 million people at imminent risk of eviction. They acted cowardly, late at night and with the news dominated by the events in Afghanistan, hoping to minimize public backlash.

The Supreme Court made it clear that now it is up to Congress whether millions of families will rapidly be turned out onto the streets. The people demand immediate action from Congress to resume the moratorium and stop evictions!

Join emergency protests nationwide! DENVER: Emergency Protest: Congress - Act Now to Stop Evictions!
item.author: Party for Socialism and Liberation

🚨Location change due to weather 🚨
Due to the forecast of thunderstorms we are moving this event online!
Join us on zoom at 6pm for a study discussing black women freedom fighters, the dark history of forced sterilization, and how we can and must fight back against the racism in reproductive healthcare!
See you all soon!
Click the link below to join the meeting.
